description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) performs a variety of system environment checks to determine if it is running in a virtualized or sandboxed environment, such as querying CPU temperature information and network card MAC address information.(Citation: HP RaspberryRobin 2024)
